00034 /*
00035  * This class provides a convenient interface to rrdtool.
00036  */
00037 require_once('setup.inc');
00038 require_once('tools.inc');
00039 
00040 class RRDTool {
00041     var $cmdline;
00042     var $error;
00043     var $output;
00044 
00045     function RRDTool() {
00046     global $symon;
00047 
00048     $this->method = '';
00049 
00050     if (isset($symon['rrdtool_path'])) {
00051         if (!is_executable($symon['rrdtool_path'])) {
00052         config_error('rrdtool_path', 'is not an executable');
00053         return 0;
00054         }
00055     } else {
00056         config_error('rrdtool_path', 'is not set');
00057         return 0;
00058     }
00059 
00060     return 1;
00061     }
00062 
00063     function graph($filename, $args) {
00064     global $symon;
00065 
00066     if (!is_array($args)) {
00067         $temp = preg_split("/\n/", $args);
00068     } else {
00069         $temp = $args;
00070     }
00071 
00072     $args = array();
00073     reset($temp);
00074     foreach ($temp as $t) {
00075         if ($t == '') continue;
00076         if (preg_match("/^\s+$/s", $t)) continue;
00077         array_push($args, $t);
00078     }
00079 
00080     $cmdline = $symon['rrdtool_path'] . ' graph '. $filename .
00081         hash2cmdline($args) . ' 2>&1';
00082 
00083     $result = $this->exec($cmdline);
00084 
00085     if (isset($symon['rrdtool_debug'])) {
00086         $output = "\xa rrdtool graph debug output \xa cmdline: '$cmdline'\xa errors:'".$this->get_error()."'\xa output:'".$this->get_output()."'";
00087         error_log($output);
00088     }
00089 
00090     return $result;
00091     }
00092 
00093     function get_error() {
00094     return $this->error;
00095     }
00096 
00097     function get_output() {
00098     return $this->output;
00099     }
00100 
00101     function _test() {
00102     global $symon;
00103 
00104     $cmdline = $symon['rrdtool_path'] . ' -v';
00105     if ($this->exec($cmdline) == 0) {
00106         runtime_error('apache or php setup faulty: cannot execute '.$symon['rrdtool_path']);
00107         return 0;
00108     } else {
00109         $version_info = $this->get_output();
00110         if (strlen($version_info) == 0) {
00111         runtime_error('apache or php setup faulty: can execute '.$symon['rrdtool_path']. ', but no results are returned');
00112         return 0;
00113         } else {
00114         print "\xa rrdtool version: ";
00115         if (preg_match("/rrdtool\s+(\S+)/i", $version_info, $match)) {
00116             print $match[1];
00117         } else {
00118             print "unknown";
00119         }
00120         return 1;
00121         }
00122     }
00123     }
00124 
00125     function exec($cmdline) {
00126     global $runtime;
00127 
00128     $this->error = '';
00129     $this->output = '';
00130     $this->cmdline = $cmdline;
00131 
00132     unset($reta);
00133     exec($cmdline, $reta, $ret);
00134 
00135     if ($ret != 0) {
00136         foreach($reta as $key => $value) {
00137         $this->error .= '<pre>'.$value.'</pre><br>';
00138         }
00139         return 0;
00140     } else {
00141         foreach($reta as $value) {
00142         if ($value != "") {
00143             $this->output .= '<p>'.$value.'</p>';
00144         }
00145         }
00146         if (strstr($this->output, '<p>ERROR:')) {
00147         return 0;
00148         }
00149         return 1;
00150     }
00151     return 1;
00152     }
00153 }
